role_definition: Handle the deployment, execution and on-going refinement of a prospect campaign. This includes many types of proactive prospect acquisition campaigns. The campaign execution process performs the initial selection and confirmation/validation of candidate lists and includes providing critical feedback on the impact of the campaign to the design unit to support re-calibration and refinement of the specification based on practical experience
example_of_use: A bank implements a targeted take-one mailshot acquisition campaign to attract additional customers
executive_summary: Execute a prospect campaign (version) and track and respond to impact
